titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 71) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2018 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2019 through 2027.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 71) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2018 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2019 through 2027.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-369, by Mr. Woodall.
Provides for consideration of the Senate amendment and the motion, offered by the chair of the Committee on the Budget, that the House concur in the Senate amendment.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 94.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 580.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 188 (Roll no. 582).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 188 (Roll no. 583).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 71) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2018 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2019 through 2027.
